attributes.action: Call for a Parliamentary vote on if the UK should remain or leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: This referendum should never have happened. An ill informed public should not be made to make a decision with such vast impact of life in the UK based on half truths, lies and impossible promises. Many voters regret their vote & it has divided everyone. Now the UK faces not only leaving the EU but splitting up into independent countries/states. Parliament must take these events into account, vote on if the PM will activate Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty and act to ensure the stability of the UK
attributes.background: 38% (51.9% of 73%) of the public have voted to leave the EU after misleading & lacklustre campaigns, whilst Parliament has stood back. As our leaders we the undersigned ask Parliament with their vast resources & experience to debate & vote on if the PM will activate Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty
